subscriptionsPage.title: Subscription Information
subscriptionsPage.knowMore: Please know the following information about subscriptions

aboutUs.description1: We are an educational platform specialized in providing comprehensive and integrated educational services for high school and Azhar students. Our mission is to empower students to achieve the best academic results through high-quality and reliable educational content delivered by a distinguished group of top teachers and experts in various subjects.
aboutUs.description2: We offer high-quality interactive lessons that cover all curricula, taking into account the needs of students and providing explanations in innovative and easy-to-understand ways. We are committed to providing a stimulating educational environment that allows students to learn at their own pace, enhancing their understanding and grasp of the subject matter.
aboutUs.visionDescription: We aim to be the primary educational partner for students on their journey to achieve excellence by offering constantly updated educational content that meets their aspirations and keeps pace with modern developments.

privacyPolicyDetails.policy1: Our platform is committed to protecting the privacy of its users and ensuring the confidentiality of their personal information. This policy outlines how we collect and use the personal information you provide when using our services.
privacyPolicyDetails.policy2: We collect the personal information you provide when registering on the platform, such as your name, email address, phone number, and academic data. We may also collect additional information when you use the platform, such as academic records, educational preferences, and usage patterns.
privacyPolicyDetails.policy3: Personal information is used to enhance your educational experience on the platform, provide personalized services, and send notifications related to lessons, exams, and special offers. We may also use the information to analyze usage patterns and develop our services.
privacyPolicyDetails.policy4: We take all necessary security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Personal information is stored on secure servers protected by modern security protocols.
privacyPolicyDetails.policy5: We are committed to not sell, rent, or share your personal information with any third party without your prior consent, except in cases required by applicable laws or to fulfill contracts for providing educational services.
privacyPolicyDetails.policy6: You have the right to access, update, or modify your personal information at any time through your account settings. You may also request the deletion of your personal data from our records, subject to certain exceptions required by law.
privacyPolicyDetails.policy7: We reserve the right to modify this policy from time to time to meet legal changes or technological developments. You will be notified of any significant changes via email or through announcements within the platform.
privacyPolicyDetails.policy8: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, you can contact us via the following email: alsafwacompany24@gmail.com.
